text: The 1987 Vuelta a España was the 42nd edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Benidorm, with a prologue individual time trial on 23 April, and Stage 12 occurred on 5 May with a stage from Cangas de Onís. The race finished in Madrid on 15 May. ==Stage 12== 5 May 1987 — Cangas de Onís to Oviedo, {| |Stage 12 result {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team !
